context.rdfs:comment:
A GeoCircle is a GeoShape representing a circular geographic area. As it is a GeoShape
          it provides the simple textual property 'circle', but also allows the combination of postalCode alongside geoRadius.
          The center of the circle can be indicated via the 'geoMidpoint' property, or more approximately using 'address', 'postalCode'.
context.rdfs:label: GeoCircle

properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates the approximate radius of a GeoCircle (metres unless indicated otherwise via Distance notation).
properties.rdfs:label: geoRadius

properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates the GeoCoordinates at the centre of a GeoShape e.g. GeoCircle.
properties.rdfs:label: geoMidpoint
